Title: Silverlight controls library
Description: This is the library of WPF (and not only WPF) control, I missing in Silverlight 2.0.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is the library of WPF (and not only WPF) control, I missing in Silverlight 2.0.

Overview

The main purpose of this library is to provide controls, I'm missing in current release of Silverlight. Initial release of this library includes following contols
  1. WrapPanel
  2. RangeSlider - for more information click here
  3. DrawingBrush - for more information click here
